name: Guardian Sprouts
description:
Guardian Sprouts

Note: This is my first time makin a 2D game on unity. Also I made this game in less than 3 days.

Story Line:

You are an astronaut lost in space. You have finally got your hands on a sapling that will allow you to go back to earth. But, the robots on your space-ship want you to live on the space-ship with them forever, and so they decided to destroy the sapling. Even though you were the creator of those robots, you have to "PAY THE PRICE", and destroy the robots yourself. It is your job to protect the sapling, and reach Earth safely.

Features:
  • Mini - Map:
  • Weapon System -> Sword & Bow
  • Sci - Fi
  • Survival
  • Different types of Enemies (4 different Robots)
Controls:
  • MOVEMENT : WASD
  • AIMING : MOUSE
  • SWITCH WEAPON : Q
  • ATTACK : CLICK
  • SPACE : DASH
  • Note: the sword and arrow can deflect the bullets.
  • YOU HAVE TO SURVIVE TILL WAVE 10.
  •  GOOD LUCK!
